豣字的基本解释

豣
jiɑn
义未详。

豣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古賢切，平先，見。］
“豣1”的新字形。
三岁的猪。亦泛指大猪，兽。
[②]［yàn］
“豣2”的新字形。

豣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豣； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1196第10
【唐韻】古賢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】經天切，?音堅。【說文】三歲豕，肩相及者。【廣韻】大豕也。【詩·豳風】獻豣于公。【張協·七命】圓文之豣。　又通作肩。【詩·齊風】竝驅從兩肩兮。【傳】獸三歲曰肩。又【周禮·夏官·大司馬註】一歲爲豵，二歲爲豝，三歲爲特，四歲爲肩。【玉篇】或作?。　又【集韻】輕煙切，音牽。義同。或作?。　又【集韻】【韻會】?吉典切，堅上聲。【爾雅·釋獸】麕……絕有力，豣。　又【廣韻】五甸切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】倪甸切，?音硯。義同。

豣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
豣字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Boo
jiɑn
The meaning is unclear.
Boo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Gu Xianqie, Pingxian, see you. ]
The new glyph of "豣1".
Three year old pig. Also refers to big pigs and beasts in general.
[②]［yàn］
The new glyph of "豣2".
Boo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary collection] [Ministry of hog characters] 　豣; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1196 10
[Tang Yun] Ancient Xian Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Cut through the sky,? Yin Jian. [Said the text] Three-year-old hog, shoulder-to-shoulder. [Guang Yun] Big pig also. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Presenting to the public. [Zhang Xie·Seven Lives] Yuan Wen Zhi Bao.　Through the shoulder again. [Poetry·Qi Feng] And drive from both shoulders. [Biography] The beast is three years old and says his shoulder. Also [Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Da Sima Note] One year old is a pig, two years old is a pig, three years old is special, and four years old is a shoulder. [Jade articles] Or for?.　[Jiyun] Lightly smoke cuts, sound pulls. The same meaning. Or for?.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ji Dian cut, sounded firmly. 【Erya·Shimon】Nu...very powerful and powerful.　 [Guang Yun] Wudian cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ni Dian cut,? Yin Yan. The same meaning.
